name: Gelato Banditos: Prototype
description:
Travel the universe to help different factions vying for control over their galaxies. Create Gelato to gain their loyalty and support. 

Currently this is a very early development build which features bugs and changing mechanics and control schemes. 

Currently Requires an Xbox Controller:

A: Tap to toggle acceleration

B: Slow down/Reverse

Left Trigger: Throw Gelato (when outside of your ship it will pile up, hit Y to drop the pile)

Right Trigger: Shoot

LB/RB: Dash Left/Dash Right

Left Stick: Steer

Right Stick: Camera

Q: Quit

Back: Display Gelato Crafting Menu
